CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 15, 1971, pg. 35 reads:"May Festival Committee - Representatives of various denominational church groups, which makeup the Mon Valley Sunday School Association, sponsor the May Festival each year to raise funds for the further development of Fairview Park, the only black-owned recreation facility in Greater Pittsburgh community. Among the committee persons pictured above are Mrs. Ressa Supples, chairman; March Conyers, co-chairman; Edward Coles, president of the association, Mrs. Zellars and Mrs. Brazelia Poole, secretary. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of May Festival Committee members including Ressa Supples, March Conyers, Edward Coles, Mrs. Zellars, and Brazelia Poole, gathered around a table in a room with floral and square patterned curtains, another version
